text: nivu nim'modeyana bali ksameyacisiri mattu avanedege oliyiri. Avanu nimage ondu nirdista avadhiya tanaka srestha sampatsadhanagalannu dayapalisuvanu mattu pratiyobba anugrahasalige tanna anugrahavannu karunisuvanu. Nivu (avanannu) kadeganisidare, ondu maha dinada sikseyu nim'ma mele eraguva bhaya nanagide
